Posts.Content: On Jan 24, 2010 7:53 PM jazzergail2 wrote: I've just completed my 5 years on Aromasin.  Stopped one month ago and now feel even worse.  Can barely stay awake, no appetite, exhausted.  Any one else have similar experiences? This sounds just like me. How are you feeling now? I just stopped aromasin 19 days ago. I had two years of Tamoxafin and the last 3 years of Aromsin. I too am feeling VERY tired, not much of an appetite. I hope it gets better. I was thinking it was maybe the heat. It has been very humid the last couple of weeks.
Posts.Title: Stopping Aromasin
